message: Tweeten 4.0.2 is now out with a bunch of fixes and improvements:
new: Tweeten now lets you reset your Twitter password from within the app
Backup codes for two-factor authentication are now support
The alerts in the login window are less obtrusive now
Improved the loading animation and the login window animations
Improved Windows Store detection for auto updates
fixes: Fixed the copy/paste issue for the input fields on the login page for Mac users
Tweeten no longer looks bigger than other app icons on your Mac's dock
